content: <timbeiko> I'd lean towards more accurate üòÅ! A simple tweak may be to mention `MIN_EPOCHS_FOR_BLOB_SIDECARS_REQUESTS` in the EIP and point people to the CL spec (to avoid stale values)?

content: my viewpoint is also EIPs shouldn't deal with real values and just use the  names (constants or fns) which people can correlate with the referred specs
